comments:
build.eclipse.org is unable to run eclipse with a GUI.

To replicate the problem do this:

1) SSH to build.eclipse.org - set X tunneling over ssh
   (this is only necessary because it is the only way we can access)

2) tar zxvf ~/downloads/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.1.1-200509290840/eclipse-SDK-3.1.1-linux-gtk-ppc.tar.gz

3) run eclipse.

You will get the following exception recorded in the .log file.  The exception suggests that eclipse is unable initialize its OS/platform support - meaning GTK.

This problem is a blocking issue for us to run WTP builds on build.eclipse.org.   Build depends on our ability to run eclipse in gui and headless modes.  We are able to run eclipse in the headless mode, but not with a GUI.




!SESSION 2006-01-28 01:50:43.658 -----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M20050929-0840
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM build cxp64142-20050929 (SR3) (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=ppc, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch ppc
